ygData.subject: Re: Another idea on critical hits
ygData.msgSnippet: This might work, but not very realistic for being once a day.  Once an opponent maybe, but for lesser damage? And it should zap part of your stamina (actually
ygData.messageBody:
This might work, but not very realistic for being once a day. Once an
opponent maybe, but for lesser damage? And it should zap part of your
stamina (actually the invoking of the critical strike, my other idea, should
also take away your stamina).

> ----------
> From: Tom Swift[SMTP:tswift@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 11:12 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Another idea on critical hits
>
>
> Perhaps critical hit should be a skill like the shadow knight's harm
> touch, or paladin's lay hands. A large damage ability based on level that
> is available only once a day, or some other interval?
>
> I personally like the skill idea, but I thought I would toss this up for
> debate.
>
